translation: Yylhi khdae sund mdd th ftḥ mkh pnnyv ātharv th ntạyjv san tohyhi vvt th ḥạṣl spud. (tmikụ̄ āthar yim tth petth murtb spdvnụ̄ chhi tim ge kh)

Byyhi yylhi vuchhvukh tvhụ̄ khdae sndis dyns yʿne aslams andr lvukh dạkhl spdan fvjv fvjv, (tmhi saʿth zạniv tvhụ̄ kh dunyahs mnz rvznuk mqṣvd spud ḥạṣl byyhi yus tuhndih pyghmbr bnavnh andr tkmyli diyn mqṣvd avs thi spud mkml, vonụ̄ chuh sfri ākhrt qryb, lhādha kriv tvhụ̄ tmich tyạry.)
Ps ạsyvun tvhụ̄ pnun prvrdigar munzh th pak zanan byyhi ạsiv ts ḥmd dpan. Byyhi ạsiv ts mghfrt mngan pnnhi khạṭr byyhi pnnyn aumtyn hndi khạṭr. Be shk suh chuh setthah tvbh qbvl krvun.
